org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.buffer

Interface JCudaBuffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataBuffer, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCudaDataBuffer, CudaDoubleDataBuffer, CudaFloatDataBuffer, CudaIntDataBuffer

    public interface JCudaBuffer
extends DataBuffer
    A Jcuda buffer

      • getHostPointer

        Pointer getHostPointer(int offset)
        Get the host pointer with the given offset note that this will automatically multiply the specified offset by the element size
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the pointer at the given byte offset

      • copyToHost

        void copyToHost(int offset,
              int length)
        Copies the buffer to the host
        Parameters:
        offset - the offset for the buffer (one buffer may have multiple pointers
        length - the length of the pointer (one buffer may have different lengths)
